* Scenes featuring Harvey Korman as Professor Auguste Balls and Marne Maitland as Deputy Commissioner Lasorde were deleted from the film, but were later seen in full in Trail of the Pink Panther in 1982. Graham Stark would assume the role of Professor Balls in the next film,  Revenge of the Pink Panther (1978).

link_mentions.page: List of The Avengers and The New Avengers cast members

response: |And the Violins Stopped Playing || Alexander Ramati || Horst Buchholz, Piotr Polk, Marne Maitland || War drama || Co-produced with Poland

"Death's Door" is the eighteenth episode of the fifth series of the 1960s cult British spy-fi television series The Avengers, starring Patrick Macnee and Diana Rigg, and guest starring Clifford Evans, Allan Cuthbertson, William Lucas, and Marne Maitland. It was first aired on ABC on 7 October 1967.  The episode was directed by Sidney Hayers, and written by Philip Levene.
